department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: For Department of National Defence (MDN) immediate aeronautical maintenance and repair project involving Eaton Aeroquip hoses fittings.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: W3474-240200 Eaton Aeroquip Fittings and Hoses

#### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a tender for the procurement of Eaton Aeroquip fittings and hoses. The tender is designated as W3474-240200 and is subject to the amendment number 1.

#### Key Details

| **Category** | **Information** |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | WS4149553277-Doc4149575313 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4149553277 |
| Date of Publication | 2023-08-17 |
| Tender Closing Date and Time | 2023-09-25T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | 2023-09-11 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2023-09-29 |
| Expected Contract End Date | Not specified |
| Tender Status | Ended |

#### Goods and Services Procured

The requirement is for the procurement of Eaton Aeroquip fittings and hoses. The goods and services to be procured fall under the following UNSPSC categories:

| **UNSPSC Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| *25131707* | Reconnaissance or surveillance aircraft |
| *25131708* | Anti submarine aircraft |
| *78181800* | Fixed wing aircraft maintenance and repair services |
| *78181805* | Aircraft fixed wing lighting system repair |
| *78181812* | Aircraft fixed wing pneumatic system repair |
| *78181813* | Aircraft fixed wing hydraulic power repair |
